scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js dotenv_config_path=./.env dotenv_config_debug=true
scripts.build:be: npm run build:st && npm run build --workspace=packages/backend
scripts.codetotal:dev: cross-env DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/amd64 CODETOTAL_SERVER_IMAGE=codetotal-server CODETOTAL_SERVER_VERSION=dev docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.precodetotal:beta: cross-env DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/amd64 CODETOTAL_SERVER_VERSION=beta docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml pull
scripts.codetotal:beta: cross-env echo "When CodeTotal is up, open http://localhost:8081" && cross-env DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/amd64 CODETOTAL_SERVER_VERSION=beta docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.codetotal: cross-env echo "When CodeTotal is up, open http://localhost:8081" && cross-env DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM=linux/amd64 docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.doc:install: pip install --upgrade markdown==3.3.7 mkdocs-material pymdown-extensions==9.11 mkdocs-glightbox==0.3.2 mdx_truly_sane_lists
